title: Enhancing CS Practical Skills: Psychological Resilience-Based Strategies for Improving Online English Learning Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners reduce negative emotions during online English learning by 30% using academic resilience (academic buoyancy) strategies
Learners diagnose motivation-emotion-engagement patterns and develop improvement plans through psychological network analysis
Learners increase learning engagement by 20% when performing goal-oriented English communication tasks in simulation environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
